title: Skewer, 19th century
markings: On blade or pin: below terminal a mark for Milan; a marker's mark: "MP" below an eagle's head in a circle; an illegible mark, possibly the Italian symbol for silver fineness of .800.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
description: Flat pin or blade with cast relief inverted volute, surmounted by openwork andthemion and cast flower terminal.

tombstone.epitaph:
Skewer, 19th century.
19th century. silver. Gift of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt. 1931-44-41.
